PAD_KarlachSpotsFrytz.how_to_trigger: 1. Load CTY_Main_A.2. Have Karlach in your party.3. goto -34; 24; -81or1. Have Karlach in your party.2. Origin debug book -> Karlach -> Act 3b -> An Old Friend -> Teleport to Fytz

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Karlach reunites with her old friend Fytz in Baldur's gate.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Have Avatar Karlach in your party.2. Origins debug book -> Karlach -> Act 3b -> An Old Friend -> Teleport to Fytz3. Click on Fytz.OR1. Have Companion Karlach in your party.2. Origins debug book -> Karlach -> Act 3b -> An Old Friend -> Teleport to Fytz3. Move the entire party but Karlach away from Fytz.4. Click on Fytz with Karlach.

OM_Karlach_COM.synopsis: Karlach reunites with her old friend Fytz in Baldur's gate.
OM_Karlach_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Have Companion Karlach in your party.2. Origins debug book -> Karlach -> Act 3b -> An Old Friend -> Teleport to Fytz3. Click on Fytz.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_50.text: Karlach Cliffgate. That can't possibly be you, can it?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_48.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_48.text: You look a little different, but I'd know my old friend anywhere.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_48.context: NodeContext: Karlach is disguised as another person

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_91.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_91.text: Fytz. If you aren't a sight for sore eyes.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_64.text: He's a liar. Always has been, I now realise.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_29.text: Didn't you hear? I killed that motherfucker.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_54.text: Don't worry. I'm going to deal with him.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_75.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_75.text: Karlach Cliffgate. That can't possibly be you, can it?
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_75.context: NodeContext: An old friend spotting someone she hasn't seen in 10 years.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_13.text: You look a little different, but I'd know my old friend anywhere.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_13.context: NodeContext: Karlach is disguised as another person

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_57.text: Fytz. If you aren't a sight for sore eyes.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_27.text: Where the hells have you been, girl? Last I heard you'd run off to Neverwinter. And that was, what, ten years ago?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_59.text: Gortash said you didn't even give notice.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_20.text: Good you got out while you could.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_34.text: Forget all that. How are you?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_47.text: I won't lie to you, girl - the years have been good.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_52.text: I left Gortash's gang not long after you. Started working for an arms merchant - still in the trade, as you can see.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_43.text: Met my fella Gregor that way. We've been together eight years now. And - Karlach - we've a little one on the way.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_38.text: Thank you, thank you. Even after all these years, it seemed to happen so fast. But I couldn't be happier.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_2.text: I never took you for the parental type.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_17.text: Me either. I wasn't sure I was ready - that I'd ever be ready. But it just happened one day, and let me tell you, it all just made sense somehow.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_9.text: Ha! Woman, I haven't seen that ugly mug of yours in ten years. But if you can stick around long enough to prove you mean it, you've got the job. You're my oldest friend, after all.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_19.text: There is. I'd love to introduce you properly sometime. Maybe over a flagon of something dry?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_73.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_73.text: Now that you're back in town, you must come to ours. All of you. We'll have a good supper, catch up. You can meet Gregor. And the little one, in a few months.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_12.text: For now. No one can resist the ol' Karlach charm for long.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_97.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_97.text: Finish your business in the city, then we'll arrange a proper catch-up, all right?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_6.text: Meanwhile, if you're still in the business of intimidation, I might have something you can make use of in the shop.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_44.text: Not like that. But I've got some very dear friends.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_23.text: Myself included among them. I'm so glad you're back.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_74.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_74.text: I'll give you all the gory details when we can talk in private.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_35.text: Gods, I'd love that. We have so much to catch up on.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_61.text: Sorry, I think you have the wrong person.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_72.text: Do I? But you look just like her. Minus one horn.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_7.text: Almost had you there. Hello, Fytz.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_82.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_82.text: I knew it! Karlach, my gods!

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_68.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_68.text: Sorry - you've got the wrong person.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_98.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_98.text: Funny. Well, your long lost twin was an old friend of mine. Haven't seen her in ten years, but... well, I guess she must still be off in Neverwinter, or wherever she vanished to.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_40.text: Anyway, how can I help you?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_21.text: Hope you found what you were looking for.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_25.text: Neverwinter?! Who told you I was in Neverwinter?!

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_70.text: KARLACH! I knew it was you, you arsehole. You had me thinking I was seeing visions.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_78.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_78.text: It's been so long. Gortash said you fled north - didn't even give notice. I did wonder why you never wrote.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_16.text: I would have if I could. But it's a long story.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_3.text: Plenty of those going around. Gortash really broke hard in the wrong direction this last decade.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_92.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_92.text: I think you were the only thing that kept him a little honest. After you left, things got dark, fast. I got out while my soul was still intact.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_94.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_94.text: D'you see he's the Archduke now? What the fuck, right?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_42.text: Didn't you hear? I killed that motherfucker.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_28.text: Hahaha! Oh my gods. You didn't. Did you?!
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_28.context: NodeContext: First joking, then realizing she's serious.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_8.text: Well, we both know he deserved it. Incredible. You vanish for ten years, then come back and murder the biggest prick in the city. Legend.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_83.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_83.text: Seeing as how no one's thrown you in jail yet, I suppose you got away with the crime, did you? If you're not a wanted criminal, I'd love to have you over.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_81.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_81.text: After I left Gortash's gang, I fell into merchantry, as you can see. Met a fella called Gregor. We've been together eight years now. And - Karlach - we've a little one on the way.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_77.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_77.text: Archduke Fox lording it over the hen house. What could go wrong?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_32.text: That's exactly what I said. He's going to be the death of this place, mark my words. Gregor thinks I'm biased.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_31.text: That's my fella. We've been together eight years now. And - Karlach - we've a little one on the way.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_58.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_58.text: Don't worry. I'm going to deal with him.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_63.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_63.text: If anyone can handle him, it's you. Just don't get yourself locked up - not now that you're home.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_80.text: I saw red when I found out.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_1.text: Must've been hard for you not to have a go at him then and there. Gregor doesn't see the big deal, but he doesn't know Gortash like we do.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_24.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_24.text: Gregor's my fella. We've been together eight years now. And - Karlach - we've a little one on the way.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_41.text: I'm sorry, Fytz, but I've got to run. I'm in town on very urgent business.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_33.text: What's got you in such a hurry?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_86.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_86.text: Would you believe me if I said I've got to save the city?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_39.text: I've believed every word out of that mouth of yours since I was ten years old.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_71.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_71.text: A long, shitty story. I'd love to sit down with a pint and tell 'em all to you, Fytz.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_56.text: Come find me when you're done doing what you're doing. I'll be here - dawn to dusk on the daily.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_93.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_93.text: Never mind for now. Bye, Fytz.

OM_Karlach_COM_11.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_11.text: Karlach Cliffgate. That can't possibly be you, can it?
OM_Karlach_COM_11.context: NodeContext: An old friend spotting someone she hasn't seen in 10 years.

OM_Karlach_COM_16.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_16.text: You look a little different, but I'd know my old friend anywhere.
OM_Karlach_COM_16.context: NodeContext: Karlach is disguised as another person

OM_Karlach_COM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_13.text: Fytz. If you aren't a sight for sore eyes.

OM_Karlach_COM_31.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_31.text: Where the hells have you been, girl? Last I heard you'd run off to Neverwinter. And that was, what, ten years ago?

OM_Karlach_COM_21.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_21.text: Gortash. Said you didn't even give notice.

OM_Karlach_COM_27.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_27.text: HAH. That prick. But... never mind that. Look at you. The years have been good to you.

OM_Karlach_COM_35.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_35.text: Well go on, girl! Tell me everything!

OM_Karlach_COM_19.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_19.text: First things first - you saw the news, didn't you? About Archduke Gortash?

OM_Karlach_COM_9.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_9.text: Care to introduce me to your friend, Karlach?

OM_Karlach_COM_8.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_8.text: Of course - this is Fytz. One of my old mates from the neighbourhood. We grew up together, moved to the Lower City together, even worked together for you-know-who.

OM_Karlach_COM_0.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_0.text: D'you see he's the Archduke now? What the fuck, right?

OM_Karlach_COM_26.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_26.text: Right?! I'm sure the fox will make a great duke of the henhouse.

OM_Karlach_COM_14.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_14.text: I think you were the only thing that kept him a little honest. After you left, things got dark, fast. I got out while my soul was still intact.

OM_Karlach_COM_23.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_23.text: Started working for an arms merchant - still in the trade, as you can see. Met my fella Gregor that way. We've been together eight years now. And - Karlach - we've a little one on the way.

OM_Karlach_COM_34.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_34.text: Fytz! That's incredible. Congratulations! Mum life, huh? You're going to be incredible.

OM_Karlach_COM_10.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_10.text: Gods, I hope so. Even after all these years, it seemed to happen so fast.

OM_Karlach_COM_25.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_25.text: But now that you're back in town, you must come to ours. All of you. We'll have a good supper, catch up. You can meet Gregor. And the little one, in a few months.

OM_Karlach_COM_7.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_7.text: Are the two of you together?
OM_Karlach_COM_7.context: NodeContext: Taking a stab, so a little hesitatnt on the 'together'?

OM_Karlach_COM_3.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_3.text: Absolutely. You're well-suited. I can tell just by looking at you. Pleasure to meet you, by the way.

OM_Karlach_COM_38.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_38.text: I can't tell you how good it is to see you, Fytz. I'd love to come have dinner with you and Gregor.

OM_Karlach_COM_17.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_17.text: We're in the city on some urgent business, but can I come find you when it's all settled?

OM_Karlach_COM_18.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_18.text: I'd love that. Meanwhile, if you're still in the business of intimidation, you should take a look at my stock.

OM_Karlach_COM_33.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_33.text: Great to have you back, Karlach.

OM_Karlach_COM_32.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_32.text: You let Karlach Cliffgate slip through your fingers? Poor  thing.

OM_Karlach_COM_20.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_20.text: Ew. No. Just mates. Very good mates.

OM_Karlach_COM_6.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_6.text: Aw. That's lovely. It's a pleasure to meet you.

OM_Karlach_COM_29.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_29.text: Didn't mean to touch a nerve.

OM_Karlach_COM_28.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_28.text: What's got you in such a hurry?

OM_Karlach_COM_15.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_15.text: Another long, shitty story. I'd love to sit down with a pint and tell 'em all to you, Fytz. And hear every last thing you've been up to, too.

OM_Karlach_COM_22.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
OM_Karlach_COM_22.text: Come find me when you're done doing what you're doing. I'll be here - dawn to dusk on the daily.

OM_Karlach_COM_2.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_2.text: I'll do that. See you around, Fytz.
